thread.title: Meizu M2 launched in India at Rs 6,999; sale from Oct 12
thread.title_full: Meizu M2 launched in India at Rs 6,999; sale from Oct 12

title: Meizu M2 launched in India at Rs 6,999; sale from Oct 12
text:
Oct 09, 2015, 01.08 PM | Source: IBNLive.com Meizu M2 launched in India at Rs 6,999; sale from Oct 12 The new Meizu M2 features a 5-inch 720p HD screen, 13 megapixel rear camera and a 5 megapixel front camera.   Meizu M2 launched in India at Rs 6,999; sale from Oct 12 The new Meizu M2 features a 5-inch 720p HD screen, 13 megapixel rear camera and a 5 megapixel front camera.   
M eizu has launched the M2 smartphone in India at a price of Rs 6,999. The phone will be available exclusively on Snapdeal. The company has already opened registrations for the phone, which will go on sale from October 12. 
The new Meizu M2 features a 5-inch 720p HD screen, 13 megapixel rear camera and a 5 megapixel front camera.Running the new Flyme OS 4.5 based on Android 5.1, the phone is powered by a 64-bit MT6735 quad-core processor coupled with 2 GB of RAM. 
Encased in a polycarbonate unibody, the Meizu M2 is available in a wide range of colours - white, blue, grey and pink. 
The phone has an internal storage of 16 GB with an option to expand its memory up to 128 GB using a microSD card. 
The dual-SIM Meizu M2 supports 4G networks on both SIMs.
